title: Lake Jackson Texas Police - Arrest of Rolando Reyes by Officer Johnny Cagle and Officer Mendoza - Reports

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Lake Jackson Texas Police - Arrest of Rolando Reyes by Officer Johnny Cagle and Officer Mendoza - Reports
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) A copy of the Incident Report associated with the arrest of Rolando Reyes on or about March 4, 2022

2) A copy of the Use of Force Report associated with the arrest of Rolando Reyes on or about March 4, 2022

3) A copy of any Citation issued with the arrest of Rolando Reyes on or about March 4, 2022

4) A copy of any Supplemental  Report associated with the arrest of Rolando Reyes on or about March 4, 2022

Excluded from this request:

a) Confidential information deemed protected by Texas Law, Statute or Attorney General Ruling.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stuart Martin
